transcript: it's amazing what you can accomplish when you have no choice and so to me going back to the white collar job was never an option on the board because to me I would rather have died and I mean that genuinely because when I left my white collar job it was because I didn't feel like being alive anymore and so I know what that road looked like and I know where it LED and I didn't want to go there more than I felt the pain of the failure in the short term
